entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
